trip_summary: You've always wanted to meet a Jedi, a Sith or even both ?
trip_summary_2: you can choose a planet to spend your whole trip, many activity for the trip and a vehicle that will allow you to travel on the planet and even explore it if you want
step_1_summary: A beautiful desert planet with many villages and market which will allow you to meet and trade with the locals but be careful it's a dangerous planets with it's lots of foes and treats
step_2_summary: this forest planet is full of life and lakes, the landscapes are beatiful and if you like to hike you'll fall in love with this planet, maybe you'll meet one of the cute but not to be underestimate ewok
step_3_summary: This Ecumenopolis, is the center of the galaxy in terms of economy and politics (don't go to deep)
step_4_summary: this exotics planet full of grassy hills and swampy lake is a planet known for being the birthplace of palpatine
vehicle_1_summary: This ship is a military ship it could be useful depending on what you're are trying to do
vehicle_2_summary: This Hovercraft allow for fast travel on land, many planet like tatooine a known for their speerder's races
vehicle_3_summary: one of the fastest if not the fastest ship of the whole galaxy
vehicle_4_summary: this TIE vessels will please all the empire enjoyer
activities_1_summary: Build you own lightsaber with a true kyber crystal and the help of a jedi
activities_2: Learn the way of the forces:
activities_2_summary: A whole training with a jedi (be careful not everybody is worth enough to be a jedi)
activities_3_summary: eating food on a 5-star restaurant and try some new things
activities_4_summary: watch or take part in a Speeder Race
option_3_2: Learn the way of the forces

trip_summary: You’ve always dreamed of exploring the world of Pandora? Now's your chance!
trip_summary_2: Choose your destination, select an avatar to embody, and enjoy numerous activities and adventures across the breathtaking landscapes of Pandora.
step_1_summary: A lush, vibrant jungle filled with giant trees, bioluminescent plants, and an abundance of wildlife. Be cautious of the dangerous creatures that roam the depths.
step_2_summary: Marvel at the breathtaking floating mountains and explore the aerial beauty of Pandora. Perfect for those looking to experience an entirely unique landscape.
step_3_summary: Dive into the crystal-clear waters of Pandora’s reef and discover an underwater world teeming with life, from alien fish to the mysterious creatures that lurk below.
step_4_summary: A serene, sacred place where the Na'vi commune with Eywa, the life force of Pandora. A peaceful retreat for reflection and learning the ways of the Na'vi.
vehicle_1_summary: Ride on a Banshee, one of Pandora's flying creatures, and soar through the skies as you explore the floating mountains and jungles.
vehicle_2_summary: Use the Direhorse, a native creature, for fast and smooth travel across the jungles of Pandora.
vehicle_3_summary: A human-made mechanical suit used for exploration and protection. Great for those looking to experience the world of Pandora from a more powerful perspective.
vehicle_4_summary: Explore the wonders of Pandora’s underwater world with a submarine, perfect for those wishing to explore the reef and its mysterious depths.
activities_1_summary: Learn how to bond with a Banshee and soar through the skies of Pandora like a Na'vi.
activities_2: Learn the Ways of the Na'vi:
activities_2_summary: Engage in a training session with a Na'vi guide and learn the spiritual practices of the indigenous people of Pandora.
activities_3_summary: Go on a guided safari to observe and interact with Pandora’s wildlife, from the peaceful thanator to the dangerous viperwolves.
activities_4_summary: Embark on a spiritual journey to the Sacred Grove, where you can connect with Eywa and learn about Pandora’s life force.
option_3_2: Learn the Ways of the Na'vi

trip_summary: Ever wanted to step into a world where dinosaurs roam free? Your chance is here!
trip_summary_2: Choose your destination within Jurassic Park, pick a vehicle, and immerse yourself in thrilling adventures, while encountering some of the most iconic dinosaurs in history.
step_1_summary: A dense jungle on Isla Nublar, home to some of the most iconic dinosaurs, including the mighty Tyrannosaurus rex. Be prepared for an intense, thrilling experience in the heart of Jurassic Park.
step_2_summary: Isla Sorna is known for its dangerous Velociraptors. Head to the Raptor Peninsula where you’ll observe these intelligent and deadly creatures in a controlled setting, but beware, they are never fully predictable.
step_3_summary: Isla Muerta is home to the massive aquatic creatures of Jurassic Park, including the terrifying Mosasaurus. Enjoy a boat tour to witness these creatures in action as they leap from the water.
step_4_summary: Venture into the Lost Valley of Isla Nublar, a hidden area where prehistoric creatures, like the Brachiosaurus and Triceratops, roam freely. A safe, peaceful experience for dinosaur lovers.
vehicle_1_summary: A classic safari jeep, perfect for cruising through the jungle and safely observing dinosaurs from a distance.
vehicle_2_summary: A spherical vehicle that allows you to roll through the park and interact with the dinosaurs up close, all while staying safely inside.
vehicle_3_summary: Take a thrilling helicopter ride over Jurassic Park, offering a bird's-eye view of the entire island and the dinosaurs below.
vehicle_4_summary: A specialized boat that takes you on a tour of the Mosasaurus Lagoon, offering an unforgettable view of the giant marine reptile.
activities_1_summary: Join a team of experts to track and observe dinosaurs in the wild, using high-tech equipment and techniques to safely follow their movements.
activities_2_summary: Get up close and personal with the Velociraptors in a controlled environment, learning about their behavior and intelligence from the experts.
activities_3_summary: Assist in feeding some of the herbivorous dinosaurs, such as the Brachiosaurus and Triceratops, in a supervised environment.
activities_4_summary: Take a boat tour around the Mosasaurus Lagoon and observe the massive sea creature in its natural habitat as it performs jaw-dropping leaps from the water.

trip_summary: Step into the magical world of Harry Potter! Visit iconic wizarding locations, experience magical activities, and immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Hogwarts.
trip_summary_2: Choose your destination, select your magical vehicle, and enjoy unique experiences from the wizarding world. You might even bump into a wizard or two!
step_1_summary: Step into the iconic Great Hall, where magical feasts and house sorting take place. A perfect introduction to life at Hogwarts, complete with enchanted ceiling and floating candles.
step_2_summary: Explore the bustling streets of Diagon Alley, filled with magical shops like Ollivanders, Flourish and Blotts, and Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Stock up on magical supplies and learn the art of potion-making.
step_3_summary: Visit the only all-wizarding village in Britain, home to Honeydukes, The Three Broomsticks, and the Shrieking Shack. Don't forget to try some Butterbeer!
step_4_summary: Enter the mysterious Forbidden Forest, a place filled with magical creatures like centaurs, unicorns, and acromantulas. Be cautious, though—it's not without its dangers.
vehicle_1_summary: Soar through the skies like a true Gryffindor or Slytherin! Experience the thrill of flying a broomstick as you explore the grounds of Hogwarts and beyond.
vehicle_2_summary: Take a magical train ride aboard the Hogwarts Express, traveling between London and Hogwarts. Enjoy the scenic route through the English countryside, and maybe get a glimpse of some magical creatures along the way.
vehicle_3_summary: Take a ride in a magical horse-drawn carriage that will whisk you away to your next magical adventure, whether it's Hogwarts or Hogsmeade.
vehicle_4_summary: Experience a ride through the Forbidden Forest in a carriage drawn by Thestrals. A spooky, yet magical experience!
activities_1_summary: Learn the ancient art of potion-making from a Hogwarts professor. Brew your own magical potions with ingredients like dragon liver and phoenix feather.
activities_2_summary: Create your very own wand at Ollivanders, using magical woods and cores. Will it choose you, or will you have to choose it?
activities_3_summary: Take part in a thrilling Quidditch match! Whether you're flying a broomstick or cheering from the stands, the excitement of the game will leave you spellbound.
activities_4_summary: Meet some of the magical creatures from the wizarding world, from Hippogriffs to house-elves, and even Hagrid’s pet dragon. An unforgettable experience!

trip_summary: Explore the vast and diverse world of Runeterra, from the majestic cities of Piltover and Zaun to the mystical forests of Ionia and the dangerous wilds of Freljord. Discover the secrets of each region and embark on thrilling adventures!
trip_summary_2: Choose your path between four iconic regions of Runeterra, each with its own unique culture, technology, and challenges. Will you explore the elegance of Piltover, the rebellious heart of Zaun, the tranquil beauty of Ionia, or the icy tundra of Freljord?
step_1_summary: Explore the towering city of Piltover, a beacon of innovation and elegance. Visit the grand academies and the Hextech labs, and witness the cutting-edge technology that powers this region’s advanced society.
step_2_summary: Venture into the polluted and rebellious undercity of Zaun, where survival depends on science, magic, and ingenuity. Discover the hidden laboratories, industrial sectors, and the dangers lurking in its depths.
step_3_summary: Wander through the serene and mystical forests of Ionia, a land where nature and spirit coexist. Discover the art of martial arts, spiritual magic, and the ancient traditions that define this peaceful yet conflicted region.
step_4_summary: Journey into the harsh, unforgiving lands of Freljord. Battle the icy winds and explore the ancient ruins of this cold, war-torn region, where ancient gods and powerful leaders like Ashe and Sejuani fight for control.
vehicle_1_summary: Travel in an advanced Hextech vehicle, powered by the energy of Hextech crystals. A fast and efficient way to move between Piltover and Zaun, showcasing the contrast between the cities.
vehicle_2_summary: Take part in a guided walk through Ionia, where ancient Spirit Walkers will show you how to commune with nature and tap into the region's deep spiritual magic.
vehicle_3_summary: Brave the frozen terrain of Freljord on a snow runner, a powerful vehicle designed to travel through the harshest conditions, perfect for exploring this icy wilderness.
vehicle_4_summary: Take a ride through Zaun’s industrial landscape in a hovercraft, gliding above the toxic streets and catching glimpses of the underground technology that powers the city.
activities_1_summary: Taste local delicacies and explore the rich flavors of Runeterra’s diverse cultures. Enjoy a variety of foods, from Piltover's fine dining to Zaun's street food and Ionia's herbal infusions.
activities_2_summary: Participate in a hands-on workshop where you can craft your own items, whether it’s a piece of jewelry, a mechanical invention, or a spiritual charm from Ionia. Create something special to remember your journey.
activities_3_summary: Take a scenic hike through the stunning landscapes of each region. Explore the lush forests of Ionia, the snowy peaks of Freljord, or the intricate cityscapes of Piltover and Zaun.
activities_4_summary: Experience the music and dances of Runeterra's different regions. Learn a traditional Piltover waltz, a Zaunite rhythm, or join in an Ionia-inspired performance that celebrates the natural world.

trip_summary: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Middle-earth, where you'll explore iconic locations, meet legendary characters, and experience the beauty and danger of this fantastical world. Will you join the fellowship or follow your own path?
trip_summary_2: Choose your adventure between four legendary regions of Middle-earth: the peaceful Shire, the ancient forests of Lothlórien, the rugged lands of Rohan, or the dark and mysterious Mordor. Each region offers its own unique history and challenges.
step_1_summary: Experience the idyllic life of the Hobbits in the Shire, a peaceful land of rolling hills, green meadows, and quaint villages. Enjoy the simple pleasures of life and discover the roots of the most legendary adventure ever told.
step_2_summary: Venture into the enchanted forest of Lothlórien, home of the Elves. Wander beneath the golden trees, where time seems to stand still, and uncover the secrets of this ancient and magical place.
step_3: Rohan – The Kingdom of the Riders:
step_3_summary: Ride across the plains of Rohan, a land of horse lords and sweeping grasslands. Join the Rohirrim in battle or explore their majestic capital, Edoras, a city surrounded by breathtaking mountains.
step_4_summary: Enter the dark and foreboding land of Mordor, where evil reigns and the fires of Mount Doom never cease. This dangerous region offers a glimpse into the heart of darkness that threatens Middle-earth.
vehicle_1_summary: Travel as the Rohirrim do, on horseback, across the plains of Rohan. Feel the wind in your hair as you gallop through the grasslands and experience the freedom of this legendary culture.
vehicle_2_summary: Travel by the tranquil waters of Lothlórien in an Elven boat, drifting beneath the golden leaves of the forest while taking in the beauty and serenity of this magical land.
vehicle_3_summary: Enjoy a relaxing ride in a traditional Hobbit cart through the picturesque Shire, taking in the quaint villages and the rolling hills that make this region so special.
vehicle_4_summary: For those brave enough to venture into Mordor, ride a dark steed through the desolate lands of shadow, crossing the barren wastes of this cursed realm.
activities_1_summary: Indulge in a hearty Hobbit-style feast, complete with second helpings, ale, and delicious local delicacies from the Shire. Enjoy the simple pleasures that the Hobbits cherish.
activities_2_summary: Learn the ancient art of Elven archery in Lothlórien. With expert guidance from the Elves, you'll have the chance to hone your skills and shoot with precision.
activities_3_summary: Take a lesson in horseback riding from the legendary Riders of Rohan. Learn to ride like a true Rohirrim, mastering the art of riding across vast plains and preparing for battle.
activities_4_summary: For the truly daring, embark on a challenging trek through the volcanic terrain of Mordor, following the path to the dark heart of Middle-earth, where the fate of the One Ring was sealed.
option_1_3: Rohan – The Kingdom of the Riders

trip_summary: Have you ever dreamed of exploring the final frontier and meeting Starfleet officers, Klingons, or even the Borg?
trip_summary_2: You can choose a planet or space station to spend your whole trip, engage in various activities, and select a starship or shuttle to travel between destinations.
step_1_summary: A desert planet known for its logical inhabitants, stunning landscapes, and deep philosophical traditions. Learn the ways of Surak and experience Vulcan meditation.
step_2_summary: The homeworld of the Klingons, a warrior race with a rich culture of honor and combat. Try some gagh or witness a traditional Klingon opera!
step_3_summary: A bustling space station near a stable wormhole. Interact with a variety of species, explore the Promenade, and try your luck at Quark's bar.
step_4_summary: The ultimate pleasure planet, known for its luxurious resorts, beautiful beaches, and entertainment. The perfect place to relax and unwind.
vehicle_1_summary: One of the most famous Starfleet ships, equipped with warp travel and state-of-the-art technology.
vehicle_2_summary: A small but reliable shuttle, perfect for short-range planetary exploration and transport.
vehicle_3_summary: A Klingon warship featuring cloaking technology and powerful disruptors. For those who prefer a more aggressive approach to travel.
vehicle_4_summary: The massive, ominous vessel of the Borg Collective. Resistance is futile.
activities_1_summary: Experience a day in the life of a Starfleet cadet, including simulator missions and tactical drills.
activities_2_summary: Learn the art of Klingon combat and test your strength in a traditional Bat'leth fight.
activities_3_summary: Dine at a five-star intergalactic restaurant and taste dishes from across the galaxy, including replicated delights and real alien delicacies.
activities_4_summary: Immerse yourself in a custom-programmed simulation of your choosing, from historical Earth settings to intergalactic espionage missions.

trip_summary: Step into the world of Arrakis and experience the life of a Fremen, a noble, or a spice smuggler.
trip_summary_2: You can choose a desert stronghold or a noble palace for your stay, engage in survivalist activities, and select a vehicle to traverse the harsh landscapes of the Imperium.
step_1_summary: The desert planet known for its precious spice melange, colossal sandworms, and the resilient Fremen people. Master the art of desert survival.
step_2_summary: The dark, industrial homeworld of House Harkonnen, where power and cruelty reign. Beware of political intrigues.
step_3_summary: The luxurious capital of the Imperium, where the Padishah Emperor rules in opulence and power.
step_4_summary: The oceanic homeworld of House Atreides, known for its lush landscapes, noble traditions, and strategic importance.
vehicle_1_summary: A versatile flying craft with insect-like wings, perfect for navigating the harsh deserts of Arrakis.
vehicle_2_summary: A massive ground vehicle used for spice harvesting and survival in the dunes.
vehicle_3_summary: A colossal interstellar ship used by the Spacing Guild to travel between planets instantly.
vehicle_4_summary: A powerful warship used by House Harkonnen, built for dominance and destruction.
activities_1_summary: Learn the Fremen way of summoning and riding a giant sandworm across the dunes.
activities_2_summary: Master the legendary Bene Gesserit combat technique and develop heightened reflexes.
activities_3_summary: Experience the effects of melange, the most valuable substance in the universe.
activities_4_summary: Immerse yourself in the treacherous world of noble houses and power struggles in the Imperium.

trip_summary: Step into the neon-lit streets of Night City and immerse yourself in the world of cybernetics, megacorporations, and underground gangs.
trip_summary_2: Choose a district to explore, engage in thrilling activities, and pick a vehicle to cruise through the city in style.
step_1_summary: A dense, multicultural district filled with markets, clubs, and the remnants of a failed corporate utopia. Home to many fixer operations and cyberware vendors.
step_2_summary: The luxurious heart of Night City, where the rich and powerful reside. Enjoy high-end entertainment and exclusive clubs.
step_3_summary: Once meant to be a resort paradise, now a lawless war zone controlled by the Voodoo Boys. A place for the brave and reckless.
step_4_summary: The vast, desolate wasteland surrounding Night City. Perfect for nomads and those looking to escape corporate control.
vehicle_1_summary: A sleek, high-performance sports car built for speed and style in the neon-lit streets.
vehicle_2_summary: A top-tier cyberbike inspired by Japanese street racing culture. Fast, agile, and iconic.
vehicle_3_summary: A heavily armored corporate combat vehicle for those who prefer firepower over speed.
vehicle_4_summary: A rugged, off-road vehicle designed for the Badlands, built to withstand the harshest conditions.
activities_1_summary: Get enhanced with the latest cybernetic implants, from optical upgrades to full limb replacements.
activities_2_summary: Join a crew for a high-stakes job, whether it's corporate espionage or a daring heist.
activities_3_summary: Plug into a Braindance session and relive the memories of others, whether for pleasure or intel gathering.
activities_4_summary: Compete in high-speed, underground street races for fame, cash, and respect.

trip_summary: Experience the post-apocalyptic world where survival is the only rule. Navigate through abandoned cities, scavenge for supplies, and face the undead.
trip_summary_2: Choose a survivor settlement, engage in essential survival activities, and pick a vehicle to ensure your safety on the road.
step_1_summary: A fortified community built for long-term survival. Safe within its walls, you can learn to farm, trade, and protect your home.
step_2_summary: A community led by the charismatic King Ezekiel. Here, medieval values meet modern survival tactics.
step_3_summary: A farming settlement with strong defenses. Learn to cultivate food and keep the community thriving.
step_4_summary: Once home to the Saviors, this industrial settlement is a testament to the power of leadership and control in a lawless world.
vehicle_1_summary: A reinforced vehicle designed to keep you safe from both the dead and the living.
vehicle_2_summary: Fast and maneuverable, perfect for quick getaways and scouting.
vehicle_3_summary: A reliable mode of transport when fuel is scarce and roads are blocked.
vehicle_4_summary: Spacious and durable, great for transporting supplies and survivors.
activities_1_summary: Learn hand-to-hand combat, weapon handling, and survival tactics from experienced survivors.
activities_2_summary: Explore abandoned buildings in search of food, medicine, and weapons.
activities_3_summary: Build barriers, set traps, and reinforce defenses to keep the undead at bay.
activities_4_summary: Engage in bartering to acquire essential resources and build alliances.

trip_summary: Embark on an adventure to become a Pokémon Trainer! Travel through iconic regions, catch Pokémon, and challenge powerful trainers.
trip_summary_2: Choose a region to explore, participate in exciting activities, and select your preferred mode of travel to journey across the land.
step_1_summary: The classic region where many great trainers started their journey. Home to famous cities like Pallet Town and Saffron City.
step_2_summary: A region filled with ancient traditions and legendary Pokémon. Visit the Ruins of Alph and battle in the Goldenrod Gym!
step_3_summary: A tropical paradise with vast seas and high mountains. Explore Fortree City, dive in the ocean, and battle Team Aqua or Team Magma!
step_4_summary: A cold and mysterious land where myths and reality intertwine. Climb Mt. Coronet and uncover the secrets of the Legendary Pokémon.
vehicle_1_summary: A trusty bike that lets you speed through roads and trails with ease.
vehicle_2_summary: A convenient way to travel across cities quickly, carried by a majestic Corviknight.
vehicle_3_summary: A gentle and reliable Water-type Pokémon that allows you to cross vast oceans.
vehicle_4_summary: Soar through the skies on the back of a powerful Charizard, feeling the rush of adventure!
activities_1_summary: Venture into the wild and catch Pokémon to build your ultimate team.
activities_2_summary: Test your strength by challenging Gym Leaders and earning badges!
activities_3_summary: Show off your Pokémon’s beauty, toughness, and style in dazzling competitions.
activities_4_summary: Discover the hidden locations where Legendary Pokémon reside and learn about their myths.

trip_summary: Travel through time and space with the Doctor! Visit famous planets, historical eras, and encounter iconic species.
trip_summary_2: Choose a destination, engage in thrilling activities, and pick your mode of travel across the universe.
step_1_summary: The lost homeworld of the Time Lords, full of ancient secrets, majestic citadels, and powerful technology.
step_2_summary: The birthplace of the Daleks. A desolate and war-ravaged world filled with danger and history.
step_3_summary: A futuristic utopia built as humanity’s second chance. Visit its advanced cities and meet the mysterious cat nurses!
step_4_summary: A rift in time and space where dimensions collide. A mysterious and powerful place full of wonders and threats.
vehicle_1_summary: The Doctor’s iconic time-traveling police box. Bigger on the inside and capable of going anywhere in time and space.
vehicle_2_summary: A sleek flying car used in the far future for smooth, stylish travel.
vehicle_3_summary: A compact but unpredictable time travel device, used by Time Agents and rogues alike.
vehicle_4_summary: A terrifying but highly efficient warship of the Daleks. Enter at your own risk!
activities_1_summary: Spend time with the Doctor and embark on an adventure to save the universe!
activities_2_summary: Join the fight against the Daleks and defend the galaxy from their reign of terror.
activities_3: Explore a Fixed Point in Time:
activities_3_summary: Witness a critical moment in history—but be careful not to interfere!
activities_4_summary: Step into an alternate dimension and experience a reality where things are just a little... different.
option_3_3: Explore a Fixed Point in Time

trip_summary: Travel through the grimdark future of Warhammer 40k! Explore iconic planets, witness epic battles, and encounter legendary factions.
trip_summary_2: Choose your faction, engage in intense combat, and traverse the war-torn galaxy.
step_1_summary: The fortress world of Cadia, the last bastion against the forces of Chaos, filled with military might and bravery.
step_2_summary: A deadly encounter with the Tyranid hive fleets, a swarm of alien creatures bent on consuming everything in their path.
step_3_summary: The heart of the Imperium, a planet of unparalleled importance and the seat of the God-Emperor’s reign.
step_4_summary: A terrifying warp rift where Chaos reigns supreme, a place of horror, madness, and impossible power.
vehicle_1_summary: Massive warships used by the Imperium, capable of transporting armies and engaging in colossal space battles.
vehicle_2_summary: A heavily armored tank used by the Space Marines, capable of cutting through enemy lines with devastating firepower.
vehicle_3_summary: A personal propulsion device used by elite warriors to leap into battle with incredible speed and agility.
vehicle_4_summary: A demonic war vehicle used by Chaos Space Marines, equipped with horrifying weapons and twisted technology.
activities_1_summary: Join a massive war campaign against the Orks, fighting for dominance in the galaxy.
activities_2_summary: Engage in a brutal fight against the Tyranid swarm, an alien menace determined to devour the galaxy.
activities_3_summary: Join the Imperium’s forces to defend humanity from the forces of Chaos, Xenos, and heretics.
activities_4_summary: Enter the warp, the terrifying dimension of Chaos, where reality itself is warped and dangerous entities lurk.

trip_summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure in a world filled with powerful heroes and villains! Explore iconic cities, join epic battles, and shape the fate of the world.
trip_summary_2: Choose your hero, join the fight, and experience action-packed missions in a universe of endless possibilities.
step_1_summary: The city where legendary heroes fight to protect humanity. Explore its skyscrapers, hidden lairs, and the bustling streets filled with super-powered beings.
step_2_summary: Enter the dark underworld where notorious villains plot to take over the world. It's a dangerous place, but full of secrets.
step_3_summary: A high-tech space station that serves as a base for intergalactic heroes. Explore the vast spaceports and join heroes from across the galaxy.
step_4_summary: A mysterious and unstable dimension where time and space warp, filled with ancient power and twisted beings.
vehicle_1_summary: A massive flying base used by the heroes to travel and fight across the skies. Equipped with advanced tech and weaponry.
vehicle_2_summary: A sleek, high-speed bike capable of reaching supersonic speeds, ideal for high-risk missions and quick escapes.
vehicle_3_summary: A compact device that allows instant travel across dimensions. The ultimate tool for a hero on the move.
vehicle_4_summary: A towering, armored suit piloted by the most dangerous supervillains. A deadly combination of strength and technology.
activities_1_summary: Become part of the world's most prestigious hero organization and defend humanity from powerful threats.
activities_2_summary: Team up with fellow heroes to thwart a supervillain's plan to take over the world. Prepare for action-packed battles!
activities_3_summary: Go on a daring rescue mission to save civilians from the clutches of evil. Time is critical, and danger lurks everywhere.
activities_4_summary: Step through the portal into alternate realities, where everything is different, and new heroes and villains await.

trip_summary: Embark on an epic journey through the Mass Effect universe. Explore vast star systems, encounter alien species, and take part in heroic missions to save the galaxy.
trip_summary_2: Join the crew of the Normandy or a unique mission to uncover secrets of the galaxy, and battle the Reapers and other galactic threats.
step_1_summary: The heart of galactic civilization, home to the Citadel Council. Explore this massive space station, filled with alien cultures, politics, and intrigue.
step_2_summary: The war-torn homeworld of the Krogan, a dangerous planet filled with ancient ruins, fierce creatures, and epic battles.
step_3_summary: Home of the Quarians and Geth, this planet is filled with a complex history of war, unity, and technology.
step_4_summary: A mysterious and ancient technology that allows instantaneous travel across the galaxy. A crucial part of space exploration and the key to galaxy-wide warfare.
vehicle_1_summary: A state-of-the-art stealth ship used by the Systems Alliance. Join Commander Shepard and the crew on their missions to protect the galaxy.
vehicle_2_summary: A rugged all-terrain vehicle used by the military for planetary exploration. Ideal for traversing hostile environments.
vehicle_3_summary: A lighter, faster version of the Mako, designed for high-speed exploration on dangerous terrain.
vehicle_4_summary: A massive, terrifying vessel used by the Reapers, ancient machines bent on harvesting all organic life in the galaxy.
activities_1_summary: Become part of the crew aboard the Normandy, and take part in high-stakes missions across the galaxy to stop galactic threats.
activities_2_summary: Join the battle against the Reapers, an ancient race bent on destroying all organic life. Can you help save the galaxy?
activities_3_summary: Take part in delicate political negotiations with the Citadel Council to maintain peace among the galaxy's factions.
activities_4_summary: Search for remnants of the ancient Prothean civilization. Unlock hidden technologies and secrets that could change the fate of the galaxy.
